TOOLTIP_CampaignTimeline_Description: The number of Tyrtaen Solar Days that have elapsed in this campaign so far.
TOOLTIP_ServitorCost_Description: The Cost in Servitors to begin this Construction Project.
TOOLTIP_ConstructionTime_Description: The Estimated Time in Campaign Days to complete this Construction Project.
TOOLTIP_Prerequisites_Description: List of Construction Projects that must be completed in order to start this project.
TOOLTIP_CurrencyReward_Description: You will be rewarded the indicated resource for successfully completing this Mission.
TOOLTIP_CurrencyReward_S_Description: You've been awarded the indicated resource for successfully completing this Mission.
TOOLTIP_KnightReward_Description: You will be sent the following Knight for successfully completing this Mission.
TOOLTIP_KnightReward_S_Description: You've received the following Knight for successfully completing this Mission.
TOOLTIP_BloomReduction_Description: You will reduce the active Bloom Corruption on this planet by the indicated value for successfully completing this mission.
TOOLTIP_BloomReduction_S_Description: You've reduced the active Bloom Corruption on this planet by the indicated value for successfully completing this mission.
TOOLTIP_ChaosGate_F_Description: The Chaos Gate has been opened and this System has been lost.
TOOLTIP_PrognosticarInactive_Description: A Prognosticar is not attuned to this system. You can attune a Prognosticar in the Augurium.
TOOLTIP_PrognosticarActive_Description: A Prognosticar is attuned to this system, and you will gain all of its benefits in the Combat Mission.
TOOLTIP_BarracksCapacity_Description: The current number and maximum capacity for combat ready Knights on the Ship. The maximum can be increased by upgrading the Barracks in the [b:Manufactorum].
TOOLTIP_Rank_Description: The current Promotion Rank attained by this Knight.
TOOLTIP_Commune_Description: Stasis Chamber Required: Commune with your Fallen Brothers to earn additional Ability Points or Reset and Choose New Abilities.
TOOLTIP_BattleReady_Description: This knight is ready for combat at any time.
TOOLTIP_CriticalWound_Description: This knight has a critical wound and cannot be used in combat until they recover.
TOOLTIP_Promotion_Description: This knight is available for promotion. Go to the Abilities menu to spend their Ability Points.
TOOLTIP_Wounded_Description: This knight is wounded and will enter combat with reduced Max HP until they recover.
TOOLTIP_OnMission_Description: This knight is away on a mission and cannot be used in combat until they return.
TOOLTIP_ResearchRequired_Description: Complete the Bloom Seed Purification research to unlock equipment upgrades.
TOOLTIP_WarpSurgeRisk_Description: The [b:Warp Surge] Meter increases each turn based on the planet's [b:Corruption Level] and whenever you expend Willpower using [b:Psychic] abilities. Once the meter reaches 100%, it will trigger a [b:Warp Surge], with unpredictable consequences.
TOOLTIP_Willpower_Description_Short: A Knight's Psychic Power, spent to use their active abilities. Spending WP causes the [b:Warp Surge] meter to rise.
TOOLTIP_ActionPoints_Description_Short: The number of actions a unit can take on its turn. Knights begin with 3 AP. Some actions end a unit's turn even if it has AP remaining.
TOOLTIP_NoAmmo_Description: Melee Attacks have unlimited Uses per turn and do not require Ammo.
TOOLTIP_Ammo_Description: Ranged Abilities have unlimited Uses per turn which depletes their Ammo capacity.  This Ammo capacity can be Reloaded to its Max value at the cost of 1 AP.
TOOLTIP_Skull_Description: Servo Skulls are limited to 1 Use per turn which depletes their Ammo capacity.  This Ammo cannot normally be restored during Combat.
TOOLTIP_Grenade_Description: Grenades are limited to 1 Use per turn which depletes their Ammo capacity.  This Ammo cannot normally be restored during Combat.
TOOLTIP_PsychicAbility_Description: Psychic Abilities are limited to 1 Use per turn and generally deplete WP.  Use of WP increases the risk of a Warp Surge at a rate of 5 per WP spent.
TOOLTIP_GrenadeAmmo_Description: Increases the number of available uses for equipped Grenades in combat.
TOOLTIP_GrenadeArea_Description: Increases the Blast Area for equipped Grenades in combat.
TOOLTIP_GrenadeDamage_Description: Increases the Damage (DMG) for equipped Grenades in combat.
TOOLTIP_GrenadeRange_Description: Increases the Range for equipped Grenades in combat.
TOOLTIP_ImmunityDrained_Description: This Knight cannot be affected by the Drained affliction.
TOOLTIP_ImmunityHazards_Description: This Knight cannot suffer DMG or otherwise be negatively affected by Hazards.
TOOLTIP_ImmunityHobbled_Description: This Knight cannot be affected by the Hobbled affliction.
TOOLTIP_ImmunityImmobilized_Description: This Knight cannot be affected by the Immobilized affliction.
TOOLTIP_ImmunityPinned_Description: This Knight cannot be affected by the Pinned affliction.
TOOLTIP_ImmunityPlague_Description: This Knight cannot be affected by the Plagued affliction.
TOOLTIP_ImmunityWeakened_Description: This Knight cannot be affected by the Weakened affliction.
TOOLTIP_OverwatchDamage_Description: Increases the amount of DMG this Knight will deal with their Overwatch Ability.
TOOLTIP_SkullAmmo_Description: Increases the number of available uses for equipped Servo Skulls in combat.
TOOLTIP_SkullRange_Description: Increases the Range for equipped Servo Skulls in combat.
TOOLTIP_StunDamage_Description: Provides bonus Stun Damage when this weapon hits a target. Stunned targets will always take a Critical Hit on the next attack against them and can be [b:Executed] if they have a valid target point.
